description: Main entry point for the React front-end application, setting up theme, routing, auth context, and React Query client.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root to render the React application.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: Wraps the application in React's StrictMode for highlighting potential issues.

methods.name: ThemeProvider
methods.description: Provides the Material-UI theme to the React component tree.

methods.name: QueryClientProvider
methods.description: Provides React Query client context to manage server state.

methods.name: BrowserRouter
methods.description: Enables routing in the React application using the HTML5 history API.
